messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a number of [REDACTED] have migrated into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the heavy drinking your livers are dying you should probally get that checked

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxiliary Tool Storage.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: it is a proven fact that being ruskan means that you are going to die as a kid

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: do you really want to know?

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: where do you think we keep getting all this child porn from.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: all crewmates to bar for total russian conversion

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: none can really kill all the caks

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have come up for a last ditch effort solution to kill all the caks but EVERYONE must evacuate and must be only used as a LAST DITCH ATTEMPT

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: the cak population is growing out of control at the bar we need everyone to stop them now!!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we sent in about 25 killer tomatoes to deal with the caks

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we are venting bar into space as a last ditch attempt
